R

radixSort(int[], int) - Static method in class ds.util.Arrays
Sorts an array of integer values in ascending order using the radix sort algorithm; the parameter d is an upper bound on the digit size of an element.
RBTree<T> - Class in ds.util
This class implements the Collection interface using a red-black tree as the underlying storage structure.
RBTree() - Constructor for class ds.util.RBTree
Constructs an empty RedBlack tree.
read(DataInputStream, int) - Method in class ds.util.BitArray
Read the numBits bit array from a DataInputStream.
readGraph(String) - Static method in class ds.util.DiGraph
Builds a graph whose vertices are strings by reading the vertices and edges from the textfile filename.
RectShape - Class in ds.graphics
A derived class the extends Shape with rectangle objects that are specified by a length and a width with the base point at the upper left-hand corner of the figure.
RectShape() - Constructor for class ds.graphics.RectShape
Default constructor creates an instance with base point(0.0), zero length and width, and color LIGHTGRAY.
RectShape(double, double, double, double, int) - Constructor for class ds.graphics.RectShape
Creates an instance with base point(x,y) in the upper left-hand corner, and specified length, width, and color.
RED - Static variable in class ds.graphics.Shape
The color red.
